shortBio: While almost everything you post on your food blog should be written with SEO in mind, SEO content pieces are the most intentional. For example, notice how keywords are used so prominently in this post from SimpleBites. Yoast’s SEO plugin is helpful for such writing:

ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipes.cookingMethod: Preheat grill to high. Toss shrimp with oil, garlic, chili powder, and cumin. Grill shrimp until pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
